TopicTitle: Can't place flags on top of flagpole :(

Articles.Content:
With the flagpole at the KSC now being climbable I wanted to place a flag on top of it unfortunately every time I place one and exit to the space centre view the flag just disappears also it's really tricky making sure your kerbal doesn't fall off of the top when your on there placing a flag.

Anyone else have this problem or is just my install being wierd?

Edit: Checked my persistent.sfs and all the flags that disappeared where in there despite not showing in tracking station, after deleting them suddenly placing a flag ontop of the KSP flagpole worked.
